paper_title: The Generalized Riemann Hypothesis from zeros of the zeta function
abstract: We show that the Generalized Riemann Hypothesis for all Dirichlet L-functions is a consequence of certain conjectural properties of the zeros of the Riemann zeta function. Conversely, we prove that the zeros of $Î¶(s)$ satisfy those properties under GRH.
publication_venue: 9 pages; version 2 adds historical context to the intro; Theorem 3.1 and Corollary 3.2 are now unconditional
